metadata.title: CVE-2011-3761 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: NuSOAP 0.9.5 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via adirect request to a .php file, which reveals the installation path in anerror message, as demonstrated by nuSOAP/classes/class.wsdl.php and certainother files.

criterions.comment: nusoap package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
